text: Naimthullah Khan (; 1 October 1930 â€“ 25 February 2020) was a Pakistani politician. He was a member of Jamaat-e-Islami (JI). He served as mayor of Karachi, the largest city in Pakistan, from 2001 to 2005. He was born in Karachi. He was a graduate of Punjab University and the University of Karachi. Khan died on 25 February 2020 at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mayors Category:Politicians from Karachi
title: Naimatullah Khan
